plot: HART TO HART RETURNS - Jonathan wants to buy an airplane development company from an old buddy, but evil forces in the military industrial complex fear that this might uncover their dirty dealings. Stars Robert Wagner, Stefanie Powers.
title: Hart to Hart Returns
plot_es: HART TO HART RETURNS - Jonathan wants to buy an airplane development company from an old buddy, but evil forces in the military industrial complex fear that this might uncover their dirty dealings. Stars Robert Wagner, Stefanie Powers.
